timeline.bodyText: Do we need this method?  Could we just require the validatorIndex as a second param and drop the Optional?
timeline.author: mbaxter

replies.bodyText: I kept it because otherwise, I would need to change a lot of tests, and since we don't normally require this change and only doing it for debugging purposes, I decided to keep this and pass the validator index as optional. I don't have a strong preference though.
replies.author: cemozerr
